overview: Just when you thought it was safe to go back into the carnival, TitanMen lifts the curtain on another unique fantasy. Starring ten built studs in nearly three hours of footage, Funhouse raises the bar again following the groundbreaking, award-winning Carny and its incendiary follow up Cirque Noir. Two friends stumble on a dark carnival and can’t resist temptation as they’re beckoned onto a funhouse ride, where scenes of masculine aggression and beauty unfold. Funhouse is a dark yet colorful trip you don’t want to miss.
title: Funhouse
